Text.Page: The goddess of hunters knows a thing or two about camouflage...
Mortals, you have swept away the shadows that once gathered over Velika.
How could the argons have tempted you...when you were so strong?
Your work is not yet done.
You will find that this gift is more tangible than my last blessing was.
But the weapon does not make the hunter. Your determination, valor, and kinship with your allies...those are the weapons that our enemies truly fear.
Wherever you go, may Father Arun and Mother Shara hold you in their dreams.
